shadow.name: HUNGER
shadow.description: Insatiable appetite for experience, never satisfied
shadow.thought_pattern: What's next? This isn't enough. I need more.

gift.name: ADVENTURE
gift.description: Embracing new experiences with presence and joy
gift.behavioral_signature: Enthusiastic explorer, present in each moment
gift.thought_pattern: This is amazing. I'm fully here for this experience.

siddhi.name: BOUNDLESSNESS
siddhi.description: All experience as one infinite unfolding
siddhi.somatic_signature: No separation between experiencer and experienced
siddhi.thought_pattern: I am the experience. There is no separation.

diagnosis.distortion: Seeking Future Instead of Being Present

inversion_protocols.script: You are running from the present moment by always seeking the next experience. Gate 35 is about progress through new experiences, but you've made experience itself the addiction. True adventure requires presence. You cannot taste life when you're always reaching for the next thing. Be here first.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: When craving 'next,' stop. Feel your body. Say: 'I am here. This is enough. I am present now.'

experiment.hypothesis: If I practice presence in current experience for 7 days, satisfaction will increase.
experiment.action: Daily: Pick one activity. Be fully present for it. No phone, no planning next. Just this.

success_criteria.target: Decreased seeking, increased contentment with now
